body:
Dear Chris, I got the following error using your sky view workflow on Hydya by replacing the geometry with mine: [http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&for...](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&fork=hydra_2&id=Sky_View_in_an_Urban_Canyon&slide=1&scale=1&offset=0,0) error: **1. Solution exception:Value cannot be null.**
**Parameter name: source** Appreciate if you can kindly help to take a look when you have time! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/F7UBUk0l10udKffDsuegXtB0xU4nvQw8QDMY3wrfR1LFCem2G2oD*2ElFymT2*oMCphe7vhBfpDvmrhsqXFQHfJRHBssGe9I/Capture.PNG)
topic: error on the Run Daylight Simulation component for the sky view workflow
